00020 #ifndef MRESTACKER_H
00021 #define MRESTACKER_H
00022 
00023 #include <QVector>
00024 #include <QList>
00025 #include <QHash>
00026 #include <X11/Xlib.h>
00027 
00044 class MRestacker
00045 {
00046 public:
00047     // Stacking order of windows, topmost last.
00048     typedef QList<Window> WindowStack;
00049     // Order of a single window in window stack.
00050     typedef struct {
00051         Window above; // None if topmost.
00052         Window below; // None if at bottom.
00053     } WindowOrder;
00054     // Ordered fast access window stack.
00055     typedef QHash<Window, WindowOrder> OrderedWindowStack;
00056     // Restacking operation: move window @below under window @above. */
00057     typedef QVector<WindowOrder> StackOps;
00058     typedef struct PlannerStatistics {
00059         unsigned nplans;    // number of times the planner won
00060         unsigned nwindows;  // how many windows did it stack
00061         unsigned nstackops; // with how many operations
00062         qreal    duties;    // sum of @nstackops/@nwindows for each plan
00063         QString toString() const;
00064     } PlannerStatistics;
00065 
00066 public:
00067     MRestacker()                            { init(); }
00068     MRestacker(Display *dpy, Window root)   { init(dpy, root); }
00069     void init(Display *dpy=NULL, Window root=None);
00070     void resetStats();
00071 
00072     void setState(const Window *wins, unsigned nwins, bool bottomFirst=true,
00073                   const OrderedWindowStack *subset=NULL);
00074     void setState(const QVector<Window> &wins, bool bottomFirst=true,
00075                   const OrderedWindowStack *subset=NULL)
00076         { setState(wins.constData(), wins.count(), bottomFirst, subset); }
00077     void setState(const MRestacker &other);
00078     bool syncState(bool allChildren=false);
00079 
00080     WindowStack getState() const;
00081     bool verifyState(const Window *wins=NULL, unsigned nwins=0,
00082                      bool bottomFirst=true) const;
00083     bool verifyState(const QVector<Window> &wins,
00084                      bool bottomFirst=true) const
00085         { return verifyState(wins.constData(), wins.count(), bottomFirst); }
00086 
00087     void windowCreated(Window win, Window above=None);
00088     void windowConfigured(Window win, Window above=None);
00089     void windowDestroyed(Window win);
00090 
00091     bool event(const XEvent *xev);
00092 
00093     bool restack(WindowStack newOrder);
00094 
00095 public:
00096     // Conservative/aggressive planner statistics.
00097     PlannerStatistics conStats, altStats;
00098 
00099 private:
00100     void processDestroyNotifys(WindowStack *stack=NULL);
00101     StackOps plan(WindowStack &newOrder,
00102                   WindowOrder &newBounds, OrderedWindowStack &newState);
00103     bool execute(const StackOps &ops);
00104 
00105     Display *dpy;
00106     Window root;
00107     WindowOrder sentinel;       // top and bottom windows of @state
00108     OrderedWindowStack state;   // the stacking to which the next plan() apply
00109     bool dirtyState;            // whether we believe @state is up to date
00110     unsigned long skipToEvent;  // Set by syncState() to tell event() up to
00111                                 // when it should consider events obsolete.
00112 };
00113 
00114 #endif // MRESTRACKER_H
